articles.title: Asia-Pacific stocks mixed as China keeps its benchmark lending rate unchanged - CNBC
articles.description: China on Wednesday kept the one-year loan prime rate (LPR) unchanged at 3.85% while the five-year LPR was also held steady at 4.65%.
